quizzes.question: To use custom data types, you need to define
The process of creating objects is called:
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Objects[/h1]

Just as a built-in data type is used to declare multiple variables, a class can be used to declare multiple [b]objects[/b]. As an analogy, in preparation for a new building, the architect designs a blueprint, which is used as a basis for actually building the structure. That same blueprint can be used to create multiple buildings.
Programming works in the same fashion. We define (design) a class that is the blueprint for creating objects.
In programming, the term [b]type [/b]is used to refer to a class [b]name[/b]: We're creating an object of a particular [b]type[/b].

Once we've written the class, we can create objects based on that class. Creating an object is called [b]instantiation[/b].
[note]An object is called an instance of a class.[/note]

quizzes.question: Which of the following determines the current state of an object?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Objects[/h1]

Each object has its own characteristics. Just as a person is distinguished by name, age, and gender, an object has its own set of values that differentiate it from another object of the same type.
The characteristics of an object are called [b]properties[/b]. 
Values of these properties describe the current state of an object. For example, a Person (an object of the class Person) can be 30 years old, male, and named Antonio.
 
Objects aren't always representative of just physical characteristics. 
For example, a programming object can represent a date, a time, and a bank account. A bank account is not tangible; you can't see it or touch it, but it's still a well-defined object because it has its own properties.
[note]Let's move on and see how to create your own custom classes and objects! [/note]
